description: Try our easy to follow Churros With Chocolate Sauce recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Churros With Chocolate Sauce Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium heat. Carefully pipe dough into oil, cutting into 10cm lengths. Cook 2-3 at a time for 2-3 minutes or until golden and cooked through. Remove using a slotted spoon and coat with cinnamon sugar. Transfer to plates. Repeat with remaining dough. Serve with chocolate sauce.
